flawed_nl_solution:
A total of 10*2=<<10*2=20>>20 students went on the field trip.
Some chaperones showed up, letting the group grow to 20+5=<<20+5=52>>52 individuals.
The teachers had to come as well, making the group as big as 52+2=<<52+2=54>>54 individuals.
When the school day ended, 54-10=<<54-10=44>>44 individuals were left.
A couple of chaperones followed suit, leaving 44-2=<<44-2=42>>42 people at the zoo.
#### 42

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
